app.networkError: Oops! There was a network issue: {{message}}. Please check your connection and try again.
app.btcRatesError: Unable to retrieve current BTC rates. The displayed amounts in {{currency}} may not be accurate.
app.feeEstimatesError: Unable to retrieve accurate fee estimates. Displayed transaction target times and fee amounts may be incorrect.
app.secureStorageAuthenticationPrompt: Please authenticate to access your wallet's sensitive data.

vaultSetup.title: Vault Set Up
vaultSetup.notEnoughFunds: To ensure you can unvault at least {{minRecoverableRatioPercentage}}% of your Bitcoin in the future, ThunderDen establishes a minimum vaulting amount. This assumes express transaction confirmations and the possibility of ultra-high network fees when unvaulting.Suggested Addition: Add about {{missingFunds}} to reach the vaulting minimum. Note that the exact vaultable amount might slightly differ due to changes in network fee conditions.
vaultSetup.amountError: Pick a valid amount of Btc.
vaultSetup.reduceVaultAmount: Faster vault creation fees reduce maximum to {{amount}}

bip39.importWalletSubText: Recover your wallet by entering the series of words you received during initial setup.
bip39.invalidErrorMessage: The word sequence you entered is not valid. Please double-check your words for any errors.
